name: process-pastry
description: A reusable Bun app for managing process configuration via a web UI

scripts.example: bun run index.ts --cmd "bun run example/index.ts" --env example/.env --port 3000
scripts.example:proxy: bun run index.ts --cmd "bun run example/index.ts" --env example/.env --html-route /config --proxy-port 8080
scripts.example:auth: bun run index.ts --cmd "bun run example/index.ts" --env example/.env --auth-user admin --auth-password password
scripts.example:ssl: bun run index.ts --cmd "bun run example/index.ts" --env example/.env --ssl

author: hzrd149
